data.title: - Sunny Jain
data.meta_description:
Ujala by - Sunny Jain, released 04 June 2024

Subh-e azadi (Dawn of Independence) by Faiz Ahmed Faiz
Yeh daagh daagh ujaalaa, yeh shab gazidaa seher
Woh intezaar tha jiska, yeh woh seher to nahin
(This stained, pitted first-light, this day-break battered by night,
this dawn that we all ached for, this is not that one.)
Yeh woh seher to nahin, jis ki aarzoo lekar
Chale the yaar ki mil jaayegi kahin na kahin
Falak ke dasht mein taaron ki aakhri manzil
Kahin to hogaa shab-e-sust mauj ka saahil
Kahin to jaa ke rukegaa safinaa-e-gham-e-dil
(We had set out, friends all, hoping
We should somewhere find the final destination
Of the stars in the forests of heaven
The slow‐rolling night must have a shore somewhere
The boat of the afflicted heart’s grieving will drop anchor somewhere)
data.text:
Sunny Jain is a composer, drummer & dhol player.

“One of the leading figures in North America’s burgeoning Asian music scene. A global musical alchemist and cultural agent provocateur.”

- SONGLINES (UK)

In 2020 Sunny Jain released his debut album, "Wild Wild East" for Smithsonian Folkways Recordings. He's also the founder, bandleader and dhol player for the pioneering global band, Red Baraat. ... more
